news.title: Samsung to Beat Apple to Ultrathin Phone With New S25 Edge

news.title: How to use options to play small caps, Apple earnings
news.content: Small caps (^RUT) have rallied about 18% over the last year. But it has been anything but a smooth ride. To hedge against the downside, BayCrest managing director David Boole recommends buying puts on the iShares Russell 2000 ETF (IWM). Learn the details of Boole's small-cap call and how he thinks investors may want to play Apple's (AAPL) earnings in the video above.  To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination here. This post was written by Stephanie Mikulich.

news.title: Apple (AAPL) Ascends But Remains Behind Market: Some Facts to Note
news.content: In the closing of the recent trading day, Apple (AAPL) stood at $223.83, denoting a +0.53% change from the preceding trading day.

news.title: Samsung debuts Galaxy S25 line with a heavy focus on AI
news.content: Samsung has debuted its new Galaxy S25 line of smartphones with a heavy focus on AI apps.
